title: Trump delivers fiery post-indictment speech: 'They're coming after you'
description: Donald Trump went on the offense in a fiery speech at the Georgia GOP's annual conference Saturday, attacking the government for the classified documents indictment.

title: California eighth graders 3D print prosthetic hand for schoolmate
description: An eight-grade class at Almaden Country Day School in San Jose, California, was presented with an advanced opportunity to design and 3D print a prosthetic hand for a third grader, Trent DeSantis, who was born without a fully formed right hand. NBC News' Maya Eaglin reports.
